backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing user profiles, daily stats, goals, and permission-checked query/update methods for per-user workout data.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references for two rehydration and loading-state issues.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of each frontend file, especially counter, stats, and loading-state logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH-themed color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, Internet Identity provider, and QueryClient for the appâ€™s main layout and screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a saved profile to enter their name before using the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header navigation, login button, profile setup dialog, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/counter/CounterScr: Main counter UI handling rep input, daily totals, goals, authentication-aware logic, and reset dialogs.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetSessi: Dialog component to confirm resetting the current set counter.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetToday: Dialog component to confirm resetting today's total reps for unauthenticated users.
Empty placeholder file for a rest timer component.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalDa: Hook for storing and retrieving the user's daily goal in localStorage with day rollover handling.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalTo: Hook for tracking today's reps and sets locally, persisting to localStorage and resetting on day change.
frontend/src/features/counter/useWorkout: Empty placeholder file for workout session logic.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Empty placeholder file for a workout history list view.
frontend/src/features/history/SessionDet: Empty placeholder file for session detail view.
frontend/src/features/stats/StatsView.ts: Stats UI showing reps, sets, and goal progress for today or a selected date with auth-aware data sources.
frontend/src/features/stats/useUserStats: Empty placeholder file for user stats logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidate dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to load and mutate user profile, daily totals, stats, and goals through the backend actor with Internet Identity gating.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and defines light/dark OKLCH design tokens and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/dayStamp.ts: Provides helpers to convert dates to day-stamp bigint identifiers and to format or parse local date strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements URL and sessionStorage utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, plugins, and dark mode settings.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, requirements, known issues, and current architectural guidance for the pull-up counter app.
